price: 9. Hana u baqaan (siday tooda ugu baqi lahaayeen) kuwa (wakiillada agoomaha) hadday ka tagi lahaayeen ubad taag yar oo ay u baqaan.Ee ha ka cabsadeen Alle, hana ku hadleen hadal toosan oo abbaar ah.
arabic: وَلۡيَخۡشَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَوۡ تَرَكُواْ مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّةٗ ضِعَٰفًا خَافُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ فَلۡيَتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡيَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدًا
